questionnaire.question: What parts of Own the Moment is Ahmed demonstrating here?
questionnaire.option2: Listening actively to the customer and understanding the emotions in the message
questionnaire.option3: Picking up the customer's call although it is a holiday
questionnaire.option4: Taking accountability to try and find a solution for the customer
